Invocation Name: best polish radio chicago
Developer Terms of Use
des: WEUR 1490-AM is a time-brokered radio station licensed to Oak Park, IL. The station has served the Chicagoland community since 1951. WEUR hosts entertainment, news, and special interest radio programs for various ethnic and cultural groups. While the majority of our programming is Polish language news, talk, sports, and entertainment, we also feature such unique longstanding broadcasts as the Hagerty Irish Program – the longest-running Irish show in the USA, and a variety of Polka shows. WPNA is home to many community favorites, including Radio Chicago,” Radio EMKA, The O’Connor Show, St. Volodymyr Ukrainian Orthodox Cathedral program, Polish Highlanders Alliance of North America program, and so much more. Because we offer such distinctive, hard-to-find broadcasts, our listeners are loyal and dedicated.
priv:
